document.text:
From: '''' 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: latest memo and redline 
Date: Mon, 08 Jul 2019 13:49:53 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Attachments: 2019-07-08,_JEJletention_memo,_draftdocx; detention_memo_redline.pdf 
I'm proofing it now (and will add Judge Berman and defense counsel as cc) and plan to submit it to Judge Pitman, Judge 
Berman, and defense counsel at 10:30 (but let me know if anybody prefers otherwise). 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00028295
